bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with hun dao 昏倒 , clouding with fall. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jing quan shui 井泉水 quoting Tang Yao jing yan fang 唐瑤經驗方 : 中煤炭毒：一時運倒，不救殺人。急以清水灌之 , “When someone has been struck by coal poison, and for some time has been experiencing [brain] movement and falls to the ground, if he is not helped this will kill that person. Quickly forcibly instill clear water into him”.
